pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
Added a couple helper functions comparing the dedalus and exact solutions.

It's best for the internal tests to use relative imports, so you can run tests on any local Dedalus package, not just the first one on the system python path.  This means, though, that you can't just execute the test modules from inside the package, but the python testing frameworks (like py.test) can properly collect them.  

Eventually I'll try to flesh this out into more of a proper testing framework, but likely not before the next big set of implementation changes for the bases.
